snippet.title: Blazing Sails 2 player ship reveal
snippet.description:
Here’s the reveal of our 2 player ship, an important part of Blazing Sails. Part of the ship, part of the crew ! When you die, you respawn on your ship. When your ship is destroyed, the team goes down with it and you are defeated.

Website: https://www.blazingsails.com/
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/mKCnCAp
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/getupgamesofficial
Twitter: https://twitter.com/get_up_games
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/getupgames/

Make sure to subscribe and ring the bell to stay up to date.
